Message:
A gentle breeze rustles my hair.
The scent of grass drifts in
from far away.

Right now, my lord and I are
heading towards my old house.

Just getting close to it brings
back memories of that day.
Scary memories...

I hold Dad’s diary
as tightly as I can,
and take one last step forward.

The place that was once
my house was now a vast
field blanketed with flowers.

The seeds that were in the house
must have all blossomed together.

The seeds Mom and Dad
left behind...

I make my way through
lots of the pretty flowers,
then crouch down
in front of a tiny stone.

“Mom. Dad... I’m home.
I’m sorry it took so long
for me to come back.”

“I found your
memories, you know.
They made me a bit jealous,
wishing I could love someone
like you guys did. Hehe.”

After that, I spoke to them
for just a little while.

I really wanted to talk more,
but if I stayed too long,
I’d end up causing trouble
for my lord.

And besides, I can come back
anytime to see them.

The special flowers standing
before Mom and Dad sway,
as if waving goodbye to me.
